entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon then becoming north 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
